"便利！オートワード活用法！":
"Arks these days are lacking enthusiasm!
It's important to have an appropriate
battle-cry! Something like \"Victory!\" or
\"Who the hell do you think I am?\"! Give a
display of our fighting spirit!

Pay attention and learn.
Set up your autowords and don't be shy!

Actually, I'm too embarrassed to do it..."
"『クエストクリア時』に設定し発動させる"
